verbose_text: Double labeling with antibodies against one of the synaptotagmins and the vesicular GABA transporter (VGAT) or vesicular glutamate transporter (VGLUT1) demonstrated that in the cerebellum Syt1 was exclusively expressed at excitatory synapses (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY B; see XREF_FIG C), whereas Syt2 was largely confined to inhibitory synapses (XREF_FIG D).
